Package org.zaproxy.zap.extension.script

Class ScriptsCache<T>

java.lang.Object
org.zaproxy.zap.extension.script.ScriptsCache<T>
public class ScriptsCache<T> extends Object
A collection of cached scripts.
Since:
2.10.0
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • refresh

      public void refresh()
      Refreshes the cache.

      Any scripts that are now disabled are removed, scripts that were changed are recreated.

      Should be called when the scripts can be safely refreshed, for example, if a script needs to be initialised before usage the cache should not be refreshed while it's being used.

    • execute

      public void execute(ScriptsCache.ScriptAction<T> action)
      Executes the given action on all cached scripts.

      Exceptions thrown during the execution of the action are handled by the ExtensionScript.

      Parameters:
      action - the action to be executed on each cached script.
      See Also:
      • ExtensionScript.handleScriptException(ScriptWrapper, Exception)

    • refreshAndExecute

      public void refreshAndExecute(ScriptsCache.ScriptAction<T> action)
      Convenience method that refreshes the cached scripts and executes the given action.
      Parameters:
      action - the action applied to each cached script.
      See Also:
      • refresh()
      • execute(ScriptAction)

    • execute

      public void execute(ScriptsCache.ScriptWrapperAction<T> action)
      Executes the given action on all cached scripts.

      Includes the corresponding script wrapper of each script.

      Exceptions thrown during the execution of the action are handled by the ExtensionScript.

      Parameters:
      action - the action to be executed on each cached script.
      See Also:
      • ExtensionScript.handleScriptException(ScriptWrapper, Exception)

    • refreshAndExecute

      public void refreshAndExecute(ScriptsCache.ScriptWrapperAction<T> action)
      Convenience method that refreshes the cached scripts and executes the given action.
      Parameters:
      action - the action applied to each cached script.
      See Also:
      • refresh()
      • execute(ScriptWrapperAction)

    • getCachedScripts

      public List<ScriptsCache.CachedScript<T>> getCachedScripts()
      Gets the cached scripts.
      Returns:
      an unmodifiable list containing the cached scripts.
